heading: HB04497
0: AN ACT STRENGTHENING QUEDAN AND RURAL CREDIT GUARANTEE CORPORATION, BROADENING ITS POWERS AND RESOURCES TO SUPPORT MICRO, SMALL AND MEDIUM ENTERPRISES, FARMERS, FISHERFOLKS, AND WORKERS BY RECONSTITUTING IT AS THE AGRICULTURAL CREDIT GUARANTEE CORPORATION, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7393, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE QUEDAN AND RURAL CREDIT GUARANTEE CORPORATION ACT AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION since 2016-11-28
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04497
FULL TITLE : AN ACT STRENGTHENING QUEDAN AND RURAL CREDIT GUARANTEE CORPORATION, BROADENING ITS POWERS AND RESOURCES TO SUPPORT MICRO, SMALL AND MEDIUM ENTERPRISES, FARMERS, FISHERFOLKS, AND WORKERS BY RECONSTITUTING IT AS THE AGRICULTURAL CREDIT GUARANTEE CORPORATION, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7393, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE QUEDAN AND RURAL CREDIT GUARANTEE CORPORATION ACT AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
